prompts: Create a giant plant-type Pokemon with vibrant green leaves and a bright pink flower on its back.
I want a Pokemon that resembles a dinosaur with a large flower on its back, showcasing shades of blue and green.
Generate a sturdy Pokemon that thrives in forests, featuring a mix of plant and poison elements.
Make a whimsical creature that has a round, blue body and an oversized flower, perfect for sunny environments.
Imagine a Pokemon that embodies nature and resilience, with a wide stance and a beautiful canopy of leaves.
Design a Pokemon that has vivid colors and a powerful presence in battle, resembling a blend of flora and fauna.
Show me a Pokemon that is both cute and tough, with a large flower that attracts other creatures.
